name: BOOK IT (Dmitriy Shmilo)
description:
A Weekly Game Jam #257 submission. The theme is "Books", so I made a game about booking time slots on a calendar. Made in roughly three days with Godot. Sources are available on github.

Controls:

  • Mouse. 
  • ESC for pause.

Credits

  • monogram font by datagoblin
  • Two Left Socks music by congusbongus
  • Shopping Theme music by "Paranoid"
  • Somewhere in the Elevator music by Peachtea@You're Perfect Studio
  • Slightly modified Masculine_A portrait by Aivopiru.
